events.message: I just received my order, but it's not what I expected. I want to return the item and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The customer reported a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product and wants to return it.
Assigning this refund case to the returns specialist to handle the refund procedure promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your item and get a refund – I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for your return to process your refund quickly?
My order number is 4587623. I decided to return the item because it doesn’t match the description on the website.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and help with the return. I appreciate how easy this process is so far.
We have received your returned item and processed the full refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since you have confirmed the refund was received, we are closing this support case. Thank you for shopping with us.
